snippet.title: Mecha-Tokyo Rush | PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Mecha-Tokyo Rush on Steam | PC HD Indie Gameplay

Game Description: In the year 16XX the city of Mecha-Tokyo has been infested with strange and powerful yōkai! Where did they come from and why are they destroying the city? It's up to Giga, Tera and the other super robots to find out and stop them!

Created by: Giant Evil Robot

Price: Free

Download link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/882220/MechaTokyo_Rush/

Make sure you Like, Comment, Subscribe and Share!

Want more Splazer?

Follow us: http://Twitter.com/Splazer
Like us at: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Splazer-Productions/186784821402916
Email: Team@Splazer.com
